languages.text: Капитан признается, что далеко не всегда в своей жизни поступал правильно, однако, узрев единожды благословение самого Императора, избрал особый путь служения Ему. И на том пути он отныне — Паломник.

traits.locale_text: Капитан признается, что далеко не всегда в своей жизни поступал правильно, однако узрев единожды благословение самого Императора, избрал особый путь служения Ему. И на том пути он Паломник.

languages.text: The captain admits he has not always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as the Pilgrim.
languages.original_text: Капитан признается, что далеко не всегда в своей жизни поступал правильно, однако, узрев единожды благословение самого Императора, избрал особый путь служения Ему. И на том пути он отныне — Паломник.

traits.locale_text: The captain admits he hasn't always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as The Pilgrim.

The captain admits he has not always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as the Pilgrim.

languages.text: 舰长承认，他的一生中并没有时时刻刻都走在正路上，但他说他曾亲眼看到过帝皇本人的祝福。从那之后，他便始终在勤勤恳恳地服侍着祂，这就是他身为朝圣者踏上的道路。
languages.original_text: The captain admits he has not always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as the Pilgrim.

traits.locale_text: 舰长承认，他的一生中并没有时时刻刻都走在正路上，但他说他曾亲眼看到过帝皇本人的祝福。从那之后，他便始终在勤勤恳恳地服侍着祂，这就是他身为朝圣者踏上的道路。

languages.text: El capitán admite que no siempre ha hecho lo correcto en su vida, pero desde que fue testigo de la bendición del mismísimo Emperador ha trabajado para servirle en todo momento. Ese es el camino que recorre el Peregrino.
languages.original_text: The captain admits he has not always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as the Pilgrim.

traits.locale_text: El capitán admite que no siempre ha hecho lo correcto en su vida, pero desde que fue testigo de la bendición del mismísimo Emperador ha trabajado para servirle en todo momento. Ese es el camino que recorre el Peregrino.

languages.text: 船長は自分の人生が常に正しいものであったわけではないと認めるが、かつて皇帝陛下の祝福を目の当たりにし、それ以来、陛下に奉仕する特別な道を歩んできたのだという。それこそが彼が今、巡礼者として踏みしめている道なのだ。
languages.original_text: The captain admits he has not always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as the Pilgrim.

traits.locale_text: 船長は自分の人生が常に正しいものであったわけではないと認めるが、かつて皇帝陛下の祝福を目の当たりにし、それ以来、陛下に奉仕する特別な道を歩んできたのだという。それこそが彼が今、巡礼者として踏みしめている道なのだ。

languages.text: Der Captain gesteht, dass er im Leben nicht immer alles richtig gemacht hat. Er hat jedoch einmal den Segen des Imperators selbst erhalten und folgt seitdem einem etwas ungewöhnlichen Pfad des Dienstes am Imperator. Diesem Pfad folgt er auch jetzt als "Pilger".
languages.original_text: The captain admits he has not always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as the Pilgrim.

traits.locale_text: Der Captain gesteht, dass er im Leben nicht immer alles richtig gemacht hat. Er hat jedoch einmal den Segen des Imperators selbst erhalten und folgt seitdem einem etwas ungewöhnlichen Pfad des Dienstes am Imperator. Diesem Pfad folgt er auch jetzt als "Pilger".

languages.text: Le capitaine admet qu'il n'a pas toujours pris les meilleures décisions au cours de sa vie, mais il a un jour assisté à la bénédiction de l'Empereur en personne, et ne vit que pour Le servir depuis lors. C'est l'existence qu'il mène aujourd'hui en tant que Pèlerin.
languages.original_text: The captain admits he has not always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as the Pilgrim.

traits.locale_text: Le capitaine admet qu'il n'a pas toujours pris les meilleures décisions au cours de sa vie, mais il a un jour assisté à la bénédiction de l'Empereur en personne, et ne vit que pour Le servir depuis lors. C'est l'existence qu'il mène aujourd'hui en tant que Pèlerin.

languages.text: Kaptan, hayatta daima doğru olanı yapmadığını kabul etse de bir zamanlar bizzat İmparator Hazretleri tarafından kutsandığını ve o zamandan beri O'na hizmet yolundan sapmadığını söylüyor. Bu yolu Hacı olarak yürüyormuş.
languages.original_text: The captain admits he has not always done the right thing in his life, but he once beheld the blessing of the Emperor Himself, and has followed a special path of service to Him ever since. That is the path he now treads as the Pilgrim.
